about.name: Anastasiia Kolisnyk
about.intro: I'm {name} — an illustrator, designer, and creative entrepreneur based in Trenčín, Slovakia. I create artwork that blends emotional clarity with thoughtful craftsmanship, bringing together illustration, storytelling, multilingual adaptation, and visual identity design.
about.work: My work spans children's books, educational materials, packaging, label design, logos, and print & digital branding. I focus on warm color palettes, intuitive composition, and imagery that feels alive — full of rhythm, sincerity, and gentle wonder.
about.goal: Whether I'm illustrating marine animals for young readers, designing a brand's visual language, or crafting packaging that tells a story, my goal is always the same: to create meaningful, heartfelt visuals that inspire curiosity and connect with people.
about.explore: Explore my portfolio to discover the projects, illustrations, and creative worlds I build with care and imagination.

designBranding.title: Design & Branding
designBranding.subtitle: Labels, logos, and visual identity — crafted with care

footer.copyright: All illustrations and artwork on this website are protected by international copyright law. Unauthorized reproduction, distribution, or use is strictly prohibited.

services.title: Services
services.intro: I offer a full range of illustration and design services — from children's book projects to brand identity. Every project is unique, so I tailor my approach to your vision, timeline, and goals. Let's create something meaningful together.

book.title: Children's Book Illustration
book.desc: Full illustration sets for children's books — from initial sketches and character development to final artwork. 24–32 pages, cohesive visual storytelling.

cover.title: Book Cover Design
cover.desc: Eye-catching cover designs that capture the essence of your story and invite readers in. Includes concept development and final print-ready artwork.

character.title: Character Design
character.desc: Original characters with personality and emotion — designed for books, animation, games, or branding. Includes expression sheets and style guides.

label.title: Label & Packaging Design
label.desc: Product labels and packaging that stand out on the shelf. Thoughtful composition, harmonious palettes, and clear typography for any product category.

logo.title: Logo Design
logo.desc: Distinctive logos that capture your brand's character and values. From monograms to emblems — timeless marks built with clarity and elegance.

branding.title: Branding & Print Design
branding.desc: Cohesive visual identity across print and digital — business cards, menus, posters, social media templates, and branded merchandise.

form.title: Let's Work Together
form.subtitle: Tell me about your project and I'll get back to you within 48 hours.
form.name: Name
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Tell me about your project — what do you need, what's the scope, any preferences for style or format?
form.successText: Your request has been received. I'll review it and get back to you within 48 hours.
form.error: Something went wrong. Please try again or contact me directly via email.

testimonials.title: Testimonials
testimonials.subtitle: What our clients say about working together

starFood.name: Star Food
starFood.text: Anastasia created product labels, a company logo, and a comprehensive unified visual style concept for our company. All tasks were completed precisely, systematically, and in accordance with our requirements. We collaborate on a regular basis and recommend Anastasia as a reliable partner with a professional approach.

baloonParty.name: Baloon Party
baloonParty.text: Our collaboration with Anastasia Kolisnyk was conducted at a high professional level. She created a comprehensive brandbook for our company, thoroughly developing the visual identity, structure, and key elements of the corporate style. All project phases were delivered with quality, on schedule, and with attention to detail. We recommend Anastasia as a reliable specialist with a strong sense of systematic and creative work.

laserCraft.name: Laser Craft
laserCraft.text: Anastasia prepared a series of graphic solutions for gift and souvenir products for our company, including logo design and the creation of a unified corporate design concept. Her work was precise, creative, and always delivered on time. We have a long-term collaboration and recommend Anastasia as a reliable and professional partner for graphic and visual projects.

blog.ctaText: I'm available for children's book illustration, branding, and visual design projects.
